GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
media: tw686x: Fix memory leak in tw686x_video_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 611f86965df013d6021e6cd0d155b1734ad2cf21, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit 704a84ccdbf19fdce9adfda0b936dfdcac52fa49. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: media: tw686x: Fix memory leak in tw686x_video_init
